name: Chocolate Cake Batter Hummus
author: France C
summary: Dessert hummus is a thing, and it is absolutely decadent without all the guilt! Serve with pretzels, strawberries, or graham crackers. Also makes a delicious filling for crepes topped with bananas. You can trick anyone into eating chickpeas when they taste this good! For a deeper color and flavor, use Dutch process cocoa powder.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
directions: Combine chickpeas, cocoa powder, maple syrup, water, tahini, vanilla extract, and salt in the bowl of a mini food processor
Blend until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl
Add additional water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until hummus is smooth
